summary: Adds a description to the ALTARS of the NINE GODS so you know what you\'re getting into when you pray to them.  I could never remember what they all were, so, now I don\'t have to.  You either.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.mgenyc.com/modsSkyrim/Blessings_Splash.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][size=3][b]WHAT IS BLESSINGS?[/b][/size][/center]

[center][color=#ced0ae]Adds \"reward descriptions\" to the ALTARS of the NINE GODS throughout SKYRIM.[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ced0ae]Why?  Because I can\'t keep the names of the Skyrim Gods in my head for longer than 5 minutes. 

I\'d happen upon a SHRINE and I\'d say to myself:[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ced0ae]\"David, what the bloody hell does this guy represent and what do I get from praying to him/her?\"[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ced0ae]Now, you no longer have to wonder because the reward for prayer is right there for you to read.[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ced0ae]Utterly unnecessary if you\'re an ELDER SCROLLS SCHOLAR, but very useful for folks like me.[/color][/center]

[center][size=3][b]INSTALL[/b][/size][/center]
[center][color=#ced0ae]Use NMM or drag the ESP into your DATA folder.[/color][/center]
[center][color=#ced0ae]Put it before anything that might alter the altars... hahah.  For the record, this mod does nothing but add descriptions to the Altars, it does not add or enhance spells or anything like that.[/color][/center]

[center]MY OTHER MODS THAT I\'D NOT MIND YOU TRYING OUT:[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9494]WARZONES : Civil Unrest[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13049]IMAGINATOR : Visual Control Device[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12525]DYNAVISION : Dynamic Depth of Field[/url][/center]
author: MyGoodEye
